page.title: 03Fund raising in Pitney
page.content: Pitney has a lovely church and next to this is the village hall which used to be the school up to 20 years ago.The hall is now used by the{Sunday {School,Youth Club,Womens' Institute and for private functions.Every August the{Flower Show}is held,the{Harvest {Supper}in October,the{village Play}is March and every 2 months a dance is held.These are very successful and are supported not just by village people but by friends and relations from other villages.In August we have a { {Barbeque}where a pig is roasted on a spit.This event attracts a large number of people.Two years ago the Youth Club did a sponsored swim to raise funds for the village hall's new extension_they collected Â£110.In March 1985 the Sunday School children did a sponsored 10 mile walk and raised Â£250 towards a new church organ.
